title: Amnesic: Seduction and Traps
description: A power-driven web of desire, betrayal, and revenge set in a mysterious modern city. The protagonist awakens with amnesia, guided by the enigmatic Sophia into a world of wealth and temptation, where every woman harbors dangerous secrets.

characters.name: Dylan
characters.description: The amnesiac protagonist, formerly known as Ryder, a powerful mob boss who lost his memory after betrayal

characters.name: Sophia
characters.description: Smart and cunning daughter of mob boss Leo, claims to be Dylan's friend but has her own agenda

characters.name: Luna
characters.description: A seductive top model who claims they were once lovers, but betrayed the protagonist

characters.name: Claire
characters.description: A strong businesswoman, calm and rational, but secretly wants to use Dylan against her husband

characters.name: Eve
characters.description: The mysterious woman from Dylan's dreams, his true love from before the amnesia

characters.name: Max
characters.description: The villain, Dylan's former right-hand man who betrayed him and now rules in his place

characters.name: Leo
characters.description: Powerful mob boss and Sophia's father, key figure in the revenge plot

characters.name: Jack
characters.description: A loyal ally who helps Dylan when he plans his revenge
